tags.description: Generate reports for Indicators of Compromise (IOC) records. IOCs are artifacts observed on a network or in an operating system that indicate a computer intrusion with high confidence.
tags.name: IOC reports

tags.description: Generate reports on the types of Indicators of Compromise (IOC) configured for your SIA implementation. IOCs are artifacts observed on a network or in an operating system that indicate a computer intrusion with high confidence.
tags.name: IOC detail reports

get.description: Lists the DNS activities of a configuration for a given domain or IP, aggregated by day. Omit `startTimeSec` and `endTimeSec` from the request URL to return all available historical information.

parameters.description: The start time for report data, in epoch seconds.
parameters.name: startTimeSec

parameters.description: The end time for report data, in epoch seconds.
parameters.name: endTimeSec

parameters.description: The target record from which to get blocklisted domains.
parameters.name: record

parameters.description: Specifies the record type, either `DOMAIN` or `IP`.
parameters.name: recordType

schema.description: High-level event details including timestamped records with associated event metrics.

columns.description: Configures the time series data columns.

rows.description: An array of arrays containing a timestamp followed by event counts.

oneOf.description: ISO 8601 timestamp within the requested time frame.
oneOf.title: timestamp string

oneOf.description: A count of events matching the timestamp.
oneOf.title: event count

value.title: Bad Request
value.detail: The system cannot understand your request.  Please check the syntax and correct any problems.

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to the problem.

errors.description: A list of HTTP problem details. The error response includes this list if there are several problems with a single request, to call out each of them separately.

items.description: A nested problem response error object.

instance.description: The URI for this error occurrence.

status.description: The HTTP status code generated by the origin server.

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type.

type.description: A URI reference that identifies the problem type.

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to the problem.

errors.description: A list of HTTP problem details. The error response includes this list if there are several problems with a single request, to call out each of them separately.

status.description: The HTTP status code generated by the origin server.

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type.

type.description: A URI reference that identifies the problem type.

parameters.description: A unique identifier for each configuration.
parameters.name: configId

get.description: Lists historical change information for a given record and record type. Omit `startTimeSec` and `endTimeSec` from the request URL to return all available historical information.

parameters.description: The start time for report data, in epoch seconds.
parameters.name: startTimeSec

parameters.description: The end time for report data, in epoch seconds.
parameters.name: endTimeSec

parameters.description: The target record from which to get blocklisted domains.
parameters.name: record

parameters.description: Specifies the record type, either `DOMAIN` or `IP`.
parameters.name: recordType

example.description: Severity upgraded from Unknown to Suspected Malware

schema.description: Details of IOC changes for the given domain.

date.description: ISO 8601 timestamp marking the record generation.

key.description: The IOC context key. get.description: Lists the IOC details for a given domain or IP.

parameters.description: Specifies the record type, either `DOMAIN` or `IP`.
parameters.name: recordType

parameters.description: The target record from which to get blocklisted domains.
parameters.name: record

parameters.description: Whether to include the `iocChanges` array in the response. Defaults to `true`.
parameters.name: includeChanges

iocChanges.description: First tracked
No longer tracked
IOC changes.

date.description: ISO 8601 timestamp marking the record generation.

key.description: The IOC context key. Either `REGISTRAR_NAME`, `REGISTRANT_NAME`, `REGISTRANT_ORG`, `CONTACT_EMAIL`, `REGISTRANT_EMAIL`, `REGISTRANT_ADDRESS`, `REGISTRANT_CITY`, `REGISTRANT_STATE`, `REGISTRANT_COUNTRY`, `REGISTRANT_TELEPHONE`, `WHO_IS_SERVER`, `CREATED_ON`, `EXPIRES_ON`, `LAST_UPDATED_ON`, `NAME_SERVER_NAMES`, `NAME_SERVER_IPS`, `CONFIDENCE`, `DESCRIPTION`, `URLS`, `THREAT_ID`, `CATEGORIES`, `AVC_APP_ID`, `AVC_CAT_ID`, `AVC_RISK_ID`, `AVC_OPERATIONS`, `AVC_TAGS`, `AVC_PROXY`, or `AVC_CURATION`.

items.description: Details of AVC info related to IOC.

appId.description: Unique identifier for the application's AVC category.

categoryId.description: A unique identifier for the category.

operations.description: List of operations for the IOC AVC event.

riskId.description: A unique identifier for the risk category.

categoryId.description: A unique identifier for the category.

categoryName.description: The name of the IOC category.

categoryInfo.description: Category information for a domain or IP.

categoryId.description: A unique identifier for the category.

confidenceId.description: The confidence level of the list entry. Either `0` for unknown, `1` for suspected, or `2` for known.

confidenceName.description: The name of the confidence level. Either `Suspected` or `Known`.

createDate.description: The registration date of the domain in ISO 8601 format.

expiryDate.description: The expiration date of the domain registration in ISO 8601 format.

lastModifiedDate.description: The last modified date of the domain in ISO 8601 format.

nameServerIPs.description: A list of name server IP addresses for a domain.

nameServerNames.description: A list of name servers for a domain.

recordType.description: Specifies the type of record. Either `DOMAIN` or `IP`.

registrantAddress.description: The address of the domain registrant.

registrantCity.description: The city of the domain registrant.

registrantCountry.description: The country of the domain registrant.

registrantEmails.description: A list of email addresses for the domain registrant.

registrantName.description: The name of the domain registrant.

registrantOrganization.description: The organization of the domain registrant.

registrantState.description: The state of country of the domain registrant.

registrarName.description: The name of the domain registrar.

threatInformation.description: List of all IOC threat information.

items.description: Threat information properties.

categoryId.description: Category of the threat.

confidenceId.description: Confidence level for the threat. Use `1` for a suspected item and `2` for a known item. `0` is the default, and indicates an unknown confidence level for the list item.

severityId.description: Threat severity level. Either `0` - Unclassified, `1` - Critical, `2` - High, `3` - Medium, or `4` - Low. Refer to [Severity levels](https://techdocs.akamai.com/etp/docs/indicator-search#severity-levels) for more details.

severityLevel.description: Severity level of the threat. Either `Unclassified`, `Critical`, `High`, `Medium`, or `Low`. Refer to [Severity levels](https://techdocs.akamai.com/etp/docs/indicator-search#severity-levels) for more details.

whoisServer.description: The name of server of the domain registrant.

avcInformation.appDescription: Facebook is the world's largest social networking service operated by Facebook, Inc.
avcInformation.categoryDescription: Websites that promote social networking and have online communities where users interact and communicate with one another.
avcInformation.riskDescription: Indicates the application is extremely at risk for data loss or a security breach. These applications allow users to perform high-risk actions such as sending or sharing files and making remote connections that can bypass enterprise security.
